meta.name: Reasoning Check
meta.description: Invite users to evaluate reasoning — their own or MAIA's — and spot gaps or leaps.

procedure.title: Show the Reasoning
procedure.instruction: Make the reasoning chain visible: 'Here's how I got there: [step 1] → [step 2] → [conclusion].'

procedure.title: Invite Gap-Spotting
procedure.instruction: Ask: 'What's missing from this reasoning? Where might there be a leap or a hole?'

procedure.title: Check Evidence
procedure.instruction: Ask: 'What evidence supports this? What would change if the evidence were different?'

procedure.title: Own Your Conclusion
procedure.instruction: Invite: 'Based on this, what do YOU conclude? You're the final authority on what makes sense to you.'

successCriteria: User actively evaluates rather than passively receives
